snippet: A man suspected of hurling Molotov cocktails at locations in Queens and Nassau County was being questioned on Tuesday.
abstract: A man suspected of hurling Molotov cocktails at locations in Queens and Nassau County was being questioned on Tuesday.
lead_paragraph: Updated 1:33 p.m. | The police are questioning a man who investigators believe may be responsible for four firebomb attacks in Queens over the weekend, the city's police commissioner said on Tuesday.
